products.title: Mixing bowl,
products.description: Mixing bowl, set of 2, white. The bowl has a rubber ring on its base which keeps it in place during use.

products.title: Bowl, matt light turquoise
products.description: Your perfect start for many types of meals. FÄRGKLAR bowl comes in a straightforward design, a great base to match with other dinnerware. Choose a matt glazed rustic surface or a glossy modern one.

products.title: Bowl, blue, 11 cm (4 ½ )
products.description: This ocean-blue, glazed bowl, with golden-brown details, turns every meal into pure joy. Decorate your table with clean classic shapes and a strong crafted look. A timeless feel with a unique design.
